bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Hello,
Gsmartcontrol doesn't start from gnome-shell overview. No error message. But it start from a terminal. When launched from a terminal it ask for root permission. Maybe it's the problem, I don't know.
Thanks !
I tried from KDE and it don't start too.
Works for me on several desktops. Do you have consolehelper-gtk installed?

(In reply to Yaakov Selkowitz from comment #2) > Works for me on several desktops. Do you have consolehelper-gtk installed?
(The command is named consolehelper-gtk but the package is usermode-gtk.)

It work with usermode-gtk installed ! Why it was not installed ? Don't know if it's related bu I use "install_weak_deps=False" in "/etc/dnf/dnf.conf" but don't remember why :D
Thanks !

(In reply to jeremy9856 from comment #4) > It work with usermode-gtk installed ! Why it was not installed ? > Don't know if it's related bu I use "install_weak_deps=False" in > "/etc/dnf/dnf.conf" but don't remember why :D
Yes, I believe that is related.
The question therefore remains if gsmartcontrol, as a GUI package, should Requires: usermode-gtk instead of just usermode. I believe it should.
It seems that Eric Smith, the maintainer, don't care anymore of this package. He don't answer here and I tried on the mailing list and no one answered too...

Please check this build for F25 http://koji.fedoraproject.org/koji/taskinfo?taskID=15841299 If you need other version (for F24 etc) just say.
If all OK I am build it for all supported Fedora releases and add to repo.
Thank you very much Vasiliy for taking care of this ! I'm still on F24 so I will be pleased if you can make a F24 build :)
Done for F24 http://koji.fedoraproject.org/koji/taskinfo?taskID=15842568
Sorry, there mistake in dependency name. Please check http://koji.fedoraproject.org/koji/taskinfo?taskID=15842648
That work ! Thanks :D
